actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 so as to authorize the development of indoor recreation facilities in certain areas.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act, the Secretary of Interior to approve the use of up to 25 percent of the total amount annually allocated to a State under such Act for the planning and development of sheltered facilities for recreation activities normally pursued outdoors. Enumerates the conditions for the Secretary's consideration in granting such approval.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 so as to authorize the development of indoor recreation facilities in certain areas.
